entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove ALL platform specifics and make it implemented everywhere #29251
  • [Testing] Appium test does not perform the tap action with CarouselView. #29245
  • x:Static Binding StringFormat not working in release #29238
  • String format Shadow causes a crash in release #29237
  • Window height and width fixed based on initial orientation #29236

Closed

  • MAUI: You must set `NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription` in your Info.plist file to use the Permission: Photos." #29249
  • VisualState for ImageButton doesn't change from Pressed state back to Normal or Focused #13870
  • Buttons with images not cropping correctly on screen resize on macOS if using ContentLayout #15003
  • [iOS] CollectionView cell not expanding on label expanding to wrap #28454
  • CollectionView2 Header Overlaps Items on iOS When Resized #28541
  • WinUI apps do not handle "win-x64" RuntimeIdentifier's correctly #20299
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • ቢኒያም ደብረብርሃን ደላላ #29156

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Remove workarounds from `WinUI.targets` #29256
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [Android] - Fix KeepScrollOffset Behavior During Dynamic Item Additions in CollectionView #29255
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Update preview4 dotnet #29254
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Fixed Incorrect Window.Y and Window.Height values when closing a maximized window #29253
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [ci] Update AspNet.Security.OAuth.Apple #29250
    area-infrastructure, area-sfi, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 9 #29248
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix CarouselView EmptyView display when filtering to zero items #29247
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [sfi] Add cgmanifest.json #29244
    area-sfi, .NET 9 SR7

Merged

  • [net10.0] Update MicrosoftMauiPreviousDotNetReleasedVersion to 9.0.51 #29252
  • [net10.0] Merge main net10 #29132
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [net10.0][ci] Update sdk and runtime for preview4 channel #29246
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Removed Frame styles from the default project template #29222
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix typo in source-gen error: soruce -> source #29242
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [tests] On 9.0.4 theres no build warning for System.Text.Json #29243
  • Changes in Android cake to fix emulator boot issues on Linux #29123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Modernize MediaPicker iOS #28920
    area-essentials, essentials-mediapicker, .NET 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Compute LayoutConstraints on new *StackLayout and Grid #28931
    area-layout, community ✨, t/perf, platform/any, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28885
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [iOS] NavigationBarHiddenAnimation - iOS specifics #29220
    proposal/open, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Obsolete UseMauiCompatibility for .NET 10 #29021
    t/breaking 💥, area-compatibility, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [2025/05/03] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Testing] Fix for UITest Catalyst screenshot dimension inconsistency and image cropping issue #29204
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Scrolling Feature #29230
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Re-Enabled UI Test - Issue10222Test #29226
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [DO NOT MERGE][net10.0] 20250414 net10.0 ecosytem updates #28997
  • [net10.0] Trimmable view handlers #28357
    proposal/open, area-core-hosting
  • [iOS] Auto Resize chrome icons on iOS to make it more consistent with other platforms - TabBar #29093
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [iOS] Auto Resize chrome icons on iOS to make it more consistent with other platforms - hamburger icon #29095
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, area-controls-flyoutpage, area-controls-flyout, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar Black Background Issue When Setting Transparent Background #29225
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixing #28912 by only hiding context buttons when user already stopped dragging the cell #28914
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • Changes in provisioning to fix fails installing Appium on Linux #29105
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fixed the flyout icon and content page disappeared when focus on the shell search handler #28474
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Scrollview.ScrollTo execution only returns after manual scroll #28528
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • Updating FlyoutPage layout when parent window size changes #29209
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨
  • [Android] Fixed TransformProperties issue when a wrapper view is present #29228
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for ItemSpacing value being retained when re-entering CollectionView with ItemsLayout set to vertical or horizontal list after navigating back. #29190
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix WebView Navigated is fired when source is null #29234
    community ✨
